relevant_findings.general: Patient is alert and oriented x3, no acute distress. Dry mucous membranes, white film on tongue and palate.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Normocephalic, atraumatic, pupils equal, round, and reactive bilaterally, bilateral ptosis.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Irregular rate and rhythm, presence of systolic murmur.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally with appropriate breath sounds, no wheezes, rhonchi, or rales.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Decreased bowel sounds, non-distended, mild tenderness to deep palpation in left lower quadrant and suprapubic area, no localized tenderness to renal transplant.
relevant_findings.extremities: No clubbing, cyanosis, or edema; DP pulses 2+ bilaterally.
relevant_findings.skin: No evidence of ulcers, rash, or lesions.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Cranial nerves II-XII intact, movement appropriate.
